chart_metadata.name: omada-controller
chart_metadata.description: Omada Controller (TP-Link) is a network management controller for TP-Link Omada Equipment.

runAsContext.description: Omada Controller runs as root user.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Omada Controller is able to chown files.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Omada Controller requires this ability to bypass file permissions.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Omada Controller requires this ability to bypass file permissions for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Omada Controller requires this ability to switch group for sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Omada Controller requires this ability to switch user for sub-processes.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Omada Controller

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Omada Controller.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Omada Controller files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Omada Controller files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Manage HTTP Port
attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller HTTP management.

attrs.label: Manage HTTPS Port
attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller HTTPS management.

attrs.label: Portal HTTP Port
attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller HTTP portal.

attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller HTTPS portal.

attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller App Discovery.

attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller Discovery.

attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller Manager v1.

attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller Adopt v1.

attrs.label: Upgrade v1 Port
attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller Upgrade v1.

attrs.label: Manager v2 Port
attrs.description: The port to use for Omada Controller Manager v2.

attrs.label: Certificate
attrs.description: The certificate to use for Omada Controller </br>

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description:
Bind to the host network. </br>s

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Omada Controller.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Omada Controller.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.2.3.app_readme:
Omada Controller

Omada Controller is a network management controller for Omada (TP-Link) Equipment.
1.2.3.detailed_readme:
Omada Controller

Omada Controller is a network management controller for Omada (TP-Link) Equipment.
